data.text:
We stayed 10 days. It’s super nice and comfortable hotel. The hotel provide the best all inclusive for 4* hotel. The food was delicious, the bars gave excellent service. The room bit dated but still have good cleaning. Also the hotel have good location for a walk at the evening. 
Need to mention also that in the last all inclusive work after c/o too.
Thanks it was best value of the money and best break down.
data.title: Thanks for all

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest, Greetings from sunny Sol Y Mar Naama Bay Thanks a lot for posting a positive review on your vacation, we appreciate your cordial praises of our facilities and staff members, which are indicative of the fact that our sunny property does meet your expectations. It is an honor for us to host our guests and our hotel team is working their skills out to provide them with a high-class service and utmost comfort.
We are looking forward to your future visits,
Best Regards,
Amr Gamal
Hotel General Manager
owner_response.author: Amr Gamal

data.text:
The best hotel
Small hotel with a very beautiful territory. Delicious food. Comfortable room, cleaning every day. Brilliantly people working here, always smile and helpful. The girls from animation team never let you feel boring. Many activities during the day, evening shows and cool disco at night out the hotel. Special thanks for Alina for care
data.title: Cool hotel

data.text:
We’ve been here for 1 week, really enjoyed staying here. 
The hotel area was magnificent, full of greenery. 
The restaurant was a cozy place with cheerful and hard working employees.
Thanks to chef Mohamed Moustafa as the food was good, each day something new.
I'd also like to say a special thanks to the animation team, especially to Maryna, for being so lovely, keeping us entertained and getting us involved with the activities.
Recommended!
Hope will be back))
data.title: Cozy holiday!

data.text:
The hotel was very average. The rooms were very tired but generally clean. The bathroom was shocking and would be rated as 1 star. The shower was reflective of what you would find in shared hostel shower. The curtain was heavily stained. 
The all inclusive food was edible and very basic. I would not say you looked forward to meal times. The drinks were a challenge and never tasted the same even when staying to the same cocktail. Had to do this as many times there were no ingredients available, so a lot of the drinks were just not being served. To ask for a mojito and to be told we have no mint or limes so we have put oranges in was crazy. The most shocking part of the hotel was the sunbeds fiasco. Most of the beds were taken at 5.00am. Some guests told us they have joined a group that take it in turns running out at 5.00am. It is not a holiday if you are having to be at the pool at 5.00am to reserve a bed. The hotel needs to set a rule that no towels before 8.00am and the only think that reserves a bed is a body. Also not allowing one person to reserve 11 beds. We watched some beds that were reserved having guests turn up in the afternoon. 
The internet only works in the restaurant or reception area. Even then after a couple of minutes you have to sign back in. Shocking service. 
On a positive note the staff around the pool are very friendly. Karim interacted with everyone and lightened your time there. The pool bar guy Ahmed was friendly but the other bar staff at reception were very miserable and at one point when they explained they were not doing a particular cocktail just walked off and started to do other tasks rather than offering another alternative. We have been to Egypt before in Hurghada and received a totally opposite experience. This hotel needs to learn from other hotels. It would not take much investment to sort out their problems and improve the customer experience. The restaurant  and hotel manager were very friendly and went out of their way to talk to you. The over inflated trip advisor reviews did not help and actually heightened your expectations to then find yourself feeling let down. To base the hotel ratings on the likeable and hard working small number of staff did not give a true reflection of the hotel as a whole. The gardens surrounding the hotel amenities were well maintained and pretty. Sorry this is not a brilliant review for the hotel but is is 100% accurate and hopefully will not leave you feeling disappointed with your choice.
data.title: Realistic hotel review.

data.text:
We spent 7 nights in this amazing family-friendly hotel! 
I would note the hospitality of the stuff and the engagement of the entertainment team,  we always were busy with great activities and had a good laugh. 
Rooms were clean and cozy, great variety of the food. Transfer to the beach or you can even walk as it’s just 5 min. 
Definitely coming back next season
data.title: Amazing time in Solymar Naama Bay
